name: Protect
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You can cast this in response to any effect that would damage you or force you to make a saving throw outside of your turn.

You are immune to everything until the start of your next turn. You can't take any further responses.

After casting this spell, increase its AP cost by 10. Reduce its cost by 1 at the start of each of your turns until it returns to normal.
